status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e7nb9","text":"Collect 20-40 fly heads via Snap Freeze method into a Biomasher tube and transfer tubes to CTRND on dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7hs1m","text":"Turn on Sorvall ultracentrifuge and set temperature to 4degC, place rotor inside and turn on vacuum to allow internal temperature to set.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8lfk","text":"Add 50uL (2.5uL/fly head) of TBS with PPI to heads in Biomasher II tube and homogenize for 1.5 min with a hand-held automatic homogenizer and Biomasher pestles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4k5lo","text":"Briefly spin down in tabletop centrifuge to get the liquid to the bottom of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6gjtg","text":"Sonicate at 35% with 5 one-second pulses for tissue to break down/dissolve. Skip this step for ‘non-sonicated’ extractions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9a50f","text":"Clarify by centrifugation in a tabletop centrifuge (2,100g) for 15 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kgfu","text":"Move entire liquid sample into ThermoScientific 5ml microtube WX und MX (Cat #314352H01) before centrifuging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2o57","text":"Centrifuge the supernatant at 100,000 g (29,900 rpm) for 30 min at 4°C using the chilled rotor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1effh","text":"Remove and save Supernatant into new labeled collection Eppendorf (TBS-soluble fraction).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"297an","text":" Wash the pellet by adding 50uL of TBS with PPI and centrifuging at 100,000 g for 15 min at 4°C. Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6umeg","text":"Homogenize pellet with 30uL (1.5ul/fly head) of solvent with PPI with hand-held homogenizer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6i4jv","text":"Centrifuge at 100,000 g for 30 min at 4°C and save supernatant into new labeled collection Eppendorf (_-soluble fraction).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m3l7","text":"Wash the pellet by adding solvent 2 with PPI and centrifuging at 100,000 g for 15 min at 4°C. Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bbfb","text":"Resuspend pellet in 30ul (1.5ul/fly head) in 8M urea/5% SDS buffer with PPI by sonicating with 3 one-second pulses until it is fully resuspended. Label and save (insoluble fraction)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tnp3","text":"Perform BCA. If strapped on time, samples can wait to be quantified and stored at -80C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c11c7","text":"Protease and Phosphatase Inhibitors (cOmplete 04 693 124 001, PhosphoSTOP 04 906 837 001)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ckg4e","text":"Urea – Fisher Bioreagents #BP169-500","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dmtlg","text":"SDS – Fisher Bioreagents #BP166-500","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f3k02","text":"RIPA Buffer (PierceTM, Thermo Scientific 89900)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5jlnd","text":"NP-40 (Nonidet® P 40 Substitute, Sigma, Cat #74385)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6eco0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rvod","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2h92a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avdn4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b673a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["145","276","368"],"data":[["Stock Solutions","Formula","Storage"],["TBS","20 mM Tris Base, 150mM NaCl, pH 7.6","4C"],["20% SDS","10g SDS in 50ml of MilliQ","Room Temperature; tends to gel up, in which case you have to heat it up on a hot plate"],["RIPA Buffer","PierceTM, Thermo Scientific 89900","4C"],["10X PhosphoStop","1ml of MilliQ; 1 tablet: PhosphoStop","-20C"],["10X cOmplete","1ml of MilliQ; 1 tablet: cOmpleteMini","-20C"]],"guid":"F9E0CF092B9149EB8496EDEC282722E7","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Stock Solutions","Formula","Storage"],["TBS","20 mM Tris Base, 150mM NaCl, pH 7.6","4C"],["20% SDS","10g SDS in 50ml of MilliQ","Room Temperature; tends to gel up, in which case you have to heat it up on a hot plate"],["RIPA Buffer","PierceTM, Thermo Scientific 89900","4C"],["10X PhosphoStop","1ml of MilliQ; 1 tablet: PhosphoStop","-20C"],["10X cOmplete","1ml of MilliQ; 1 tablet: cOmpleteMini","-20C"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,"535"],"data":[["TBS","800uL TBS, 100uL 10X cOmplete, 100uL 10X PhosphoStop"],["5% SDS","550ul TBS, 100ul 10X cOmplete, 100ul 10X PhosphoStop, 250ul 20% SDS"],["RIPA","800uL RIPA Buffer, 100uL 10X cOmplete, 100uL 10X PhosphoStop"],["1% NP-40","790uL TBS, 100uL 10X cOmplete, 100uL 10X PhosphoStop, 10uL NP-40"],["8M Urea/5% SDS","300ul TBS, 100ul 10X cOmplete, 100ul 10X PhosphoStop, 250ul 20% SDS"],["","Add 0.480.4g Urea wait to dissolve then bring to 1ml with TBS"],["",""]],"guid":"9DBCB5E788B94A65B1F927B9161770EC","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"284eo","text":"Working solutions (w/ PPIs) Make and use the day of the extraction, keep on ice. Formulation per 1ml.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["TBS","800uL TBS, 100uL 10X cOmplete, 100uL 10X PhosphoStop"],["5% SDS","550ul TBS, 100ul 10X cOmplete, 100ul 10X PhosphoStop, 250ul 20% SDS"],["RIPA","800uL RIPA Buffer, 100uL 10X cOmplete, 100uL 10X PhosphoStop"],["1% NP-40","790uL TBS, 100uL 10X cOmplete, 100uL 10X PhosphoStop, 10uL NP-40"],["8M Urea/5% SDS","300ul TBS, 100ul 10X cOmplete, 100ul 10X PhosphoStop, 250ul 20% SDS"],["","Add 0.480.4g Urea wait to dissolve then bring to 1ml with TBS"],["",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

title: SOP – 3-step protein fractionation from fly heads
